mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. WAS lodged in the Prison of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 28th ult., a negro boy who calls himself Adams, black, 5 feet 4 inches in height, aged about 20 years, speaks english, no particular remarks, and says he belongs to Mr. Louis Desobry, of Big Cane, St. Landry. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, or he will be dealt with according to law. L.V. CHACHERE, Sheriff. Opelousas, August 1, 1863.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
